forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 10C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High near 50F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 1C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low around 35F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 2C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 36F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 54F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
